dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: Welcome to the land of Eldoria, a mystical realm of wonder and discovery.

dialogues.speaker: Eryndor Thorne
dialogues.text: Greetings traveler, I am Eryndor Thorne, a wise wizard who has been watching your journey. What brings you to our land?

dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: You explain that you are on a quest for the legendary Sword of Light, said to be able to vanquish any darkness.
